It has always amazed me that President Bush 's version of what took place has consistently been contrary to the facts, even when the actual version of what took place had been attested to in writing by Gerald Ford , Donald Rumsfeld concludes. George H.W. Bush isn't the only Republican who comes in for tough treatment. For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.

Asked whether he planned to stay another four years at Google to collect stock awards worth$ 100 million, Eric Schmidt said: Yes, that is my plan. Google said last month co-founder Larry Page would take over as chief executive from April 4 while Eric Schmidt would assume the role of executive chairman.
